hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin (DOGE/PEPE) Intraday RSI Fade in Bull Regime
hypothesis_content.statement: During BULL regimes, when DOGE or PEPE experiences a 1-hour RSI(14) reading above 80, a short position (or long put option) will be profitable as price mean-reverts within the same trading day, provided BTC is not in a concurrent sharp uptrend (+2% in 2 hours).
hypothesis_content.rationale: Meme coins in bull markets exhibit sharp, sentiment-driven pumps that often overextend intraday. High RSI readings combined with detachment from VWAP suggest exhausted buying, leading to quick profit-taking reversals.
entry_conditions: Price is at least 5% above its VWAP for the day

exit_conditions.take_profit: RSI(14) crosses below 60 OR price returns to daily VWAP
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price makes a new 1-hour high after entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 50% of such overbought signals lead to continued upward momentum (RSI stays >70 for 4+ hours), indicating strong trend persistence.
